name: Hooking up
description:
This is for the secret santa 2020 event. I did not have that much time so the game is bad quality and is not much. 

Your goal is to climb and learn how to navigate the obstacles. There is no way of winning so when you feel done with the level you can open your menu and click yay to go to next level. There are 3 levels so if the yay button does not work it is probably because there is no more levels. 

Controls:
You can move the camera with your mouse, you shoot hooks with the keyboard button W and you can get the menu by clicking escape.
